ordering_rules: Within each documented wave, order seeds by priority score descending.
Tie-break seed ordering by DUV descending, then DC ascending, then Seed ID ascending.
Order batches by min covered wave ascending, then class rank (small<medium<large), then Batch ID ascending.

seeds.proposed_issue_title: [v0.13][tooling] Generate seed DAG and batch skeletons from matrix
[v0.13][release] Publish signoff and evidence consolidation package

edges.rationale: Issue hygiene contract must be stable before payload synthesis.
Matrix-driven DAG generation depends on baseline syntax contract.
Governance baseline follows spec baseline publication.
Registry compatibility policy extends initial governance rules.
Spec sync normalization consumes deterministic payload outputs.
Diagnostics docs are grounded in generated DAG contract.
Conformance schema requires normalized spec sync data.
Conformance schema must map governance compatibility policy.
Cadence package builds on established governance policy.
Dispatch evidence packet updates rely on diagnostics guidance.
Quality-gate rollup depends on baseline evidence schema.
Profile-gate deltas require current governance cadence controls.
Spec profile deltas depend on refreshed dispatch evidence.
Macro tabletop controls extend quorum package outputs.
Release readiness requires profile-gate delta completion.
Release readiness requires quality-gate rollup completion.
Replay quality gates depend on macro tabletop closeout controls.
Cross-lane packet integration follows readiness assembly.
Final parity evidence depends on replay quality gate certification.
Final signoff requires integrated closeout packet state.
Final signoff requires reproducibility evidence completion.

batches.entry_prerequisites: V013-TOOL-03` matrix contract locked and lane evidence synchronized.
batches.exit_signal: AC-V013-REL-03` closeout packet published with deterministic replay evidence.
